The community is active, the maps are large, and every match feels different. If you like large-scale strategy games where patience and planning win the war, this one is worth trying.

Recommended for strategy fans who enjoy real-time global warfare and long-term decision-making.

Okay, picture this: I boot up Conflict of Nations: World War 3, pick Russia 'cause who doesn't wanna be the big bad bear? Day 1: I'm building barracks slower than my grandma knits. Troops march across Europe at snail pace ‚Äì by the time my tanks hit Ukraine, I've grown a beard and forgotten what sunlight looks like.
Week 2: I'm chilling in bed at 3 AM when ‚Äì BAM! Some Polish noob declares war while I'm snoring. My cities are getting bombed, morale's in the toilet, and rebels are popping up like whack-a-mole. No pause button? Really? This ain't chess, devs ‚Äì it's sleep deprivation simulator!
Month 1: Coalitions form faster than bad Tinder dates. I ally with Brazil (we bond over memes in chat), but then Mr. "I Spent $500 on Gold" from Germany speed-boosts his stealth bombers and turns my empire into Swiss cheese. Pay-to-win? More like pay-to-nuke-my-hopes-and-dreams. Free players like me? We're just cannon fodder for the whales.
Finally, after 45 days of checking my phone every 5 minutes (RIP social life), I launch nukes... and lose anyway 'cause the game's still running in real-time while I'm at work. Pros: Feels like actual WW3 ‚Äì stressful, endless, and nobody wins. Cons: Your sanity. 10/10 for addiction, 0/10 for sleep. Download if you hate yourself. Or just watch paint dry ‚Äì same vibes
This is a great game however I would've loved offline options because playing online is just impossible you have  to be on 24/7 to have a good chance of winning.
Good game, feels slow at the start but stick with it and you will get used to it. Warning: The 4x speed mode has a high risk to mess with your sleep, since so much can happen while you are sleeping
REALLY cool game, i like it alot bcuz its not lagy at all and you have a good time every time,but you need to wait alot to finish ANYTHING so yeah highly reccomend
I like how detailed the game is and how its real world countries/ states instead of made up ones. The only thing I would change is how long it takes for travel time
gotta love the game tho ppl in it are somewhat crazy a lot of pedos lowkey all gay men to be real

A surprisingly engaging grand strategy experience. The real-time aspect adds a layer of urgency and the diplomacy system feels impactful. While learning curve is present, the game offers a decent amount of depth for those who enjoy strategic thinking. Definitely worth trying out!

Troops march across Europe at snail pace ‚Äì by the time my tanks hit Ukraine, I've grown a beard and forgotten what sunlight looks like.
Week 2: I'm chilling in bed at 3 AM when ‚Äì BAM! Some Polish noob declares war while I'm snoring. My cities are getting bombed, morale's in the toilet, and rebels are popping up like whack-a-mole. No pause button? Really? This ain't chess, devs ‚Äì it's sleep deprivation simulator!

I ally with Brazil (we bond over memes in chat), but then Mr. "I Spent $500 on Gold" from Germany speed-boosts his stealth bombers and turns my empire into Swiss cheese. Pay-to-win? negative.review: it's basically to win if you don't want to spend money. this game is built in a way where you could be the most powerful country in the world, but with enough gold, even the fucking vatican could take you down

after putting solid hours into this game i can sit back and say its too slow everything is moving at a snails pace WE WANT AND NEED FASTER MATCHES THESE 2x 4x and 8x servers are too slow and you need tickets to get into the better servers unless you pay for it and yes the game is pay to win at times you could be the biggest countries there with a solid alliance and bam dude buys a crap load of gold and your all dead
Nothing stopping a player in a different timezone taking you out while you sleep
I would pay for a single player option

The game used to be really fun to play.  I at some point used to be a chat moderator during my high school years, but i stopped playing due to circumstances. I would partially return throughout the years and see how far it has come. I started playing more this year, joined by some of my real life friends. The game has become a gold syphon pay to win, where apart from people using gold (aka real money) to produce army etc, now can also buy "special season units", strong enough to beat most good players with no skill required. The use of gold to produce stuff was managable at certain levels, but the introduction of these "season elite units" have made this game unbearable and is what stopped me and my friends from continuing here.

If you want to win at this game, you have to pay. You could become the most powerful country in the world and be in the most powerful alliance. But someone can be much smaller than you and can just take you over with enough gold. 

THIS IS A PAY TO WIN GAME!!!! 

If you want to play this game and enjoy it, Don't fool yourself into thinking that this is a free game, This is NOT a free to play game at all,  You HAVE TO pay to play this game! Otherwise, it will frustrate you and waste your time as almost EVERYONE in this game uses gold to win and you're only choice if you want to win or even play this game is to out spend them! Buy lots of gold and spend lots of money as you will need as much as you can afford and when you run out after spending a ton of money on one map, Prepare to spend even more money on gold for the next map as you'll be constantly be spending money on this game and at the end of the day, you'll never really own this game.

[strike] Game doesn't allow me to login, simple as that. [/strike]

Edit: it does work by changing the language in the corner, but it literally still just an Electron Wrapper for the web client... ü§î

it's basically to win if you don't want to spend money. this game is built in a way where you could be the most powerful country in the world, but with enough gold, even the fucking vatican could take you down

The support offered in this game is a joke. Warning do not spend money they will just take money and no product. Support wanted a screen shot of my receipt. I sent it, they replied it was proof i got my purchased gold.

Fucking Hell wtf did you smoke when making this?? Got smoked by some thing called Elite Ulf and apperently it costrs 300 Euros wtf man just Pay to win i wasted whole 10 minutes getting bad eyesight because of this crap Fucking Dogwater game wth

Won't even let me sign in or create an account. Won't let me access anything. Everytime I try to accept the cookies it resets the whole sign-in process. I tried making a name, while its 6 characters, says its too long, I do down by a letter each time, still same thing. I try to do "Access with an existing account", nothing either. I tried accessing on my phone. Still nothing. They need to fix the game and any bugs because its bull that I can't play at all.

after putting solid hours into this game i can sit back and say its too slow everything is moving at a snails pace WE WANT AND NEED FASTER MATCHES THESE 2x 4x and 8x servers are too slow and you need tickets to get into the better servers unless you pay for it and yes the game is pay to win at times you could be the biggest countries there with a solid alliance and bam dude buys a crap load of gold and your all dead

the game is good but why the does it take 4 real life hours for my units to walk from bregenz to bern. If the game was moer fast pace and didnt use real life minutes and hours even days it would be fantastic. and yes im mad sorry
Couldn't find a tutorial and had no clue what to do. I guess they just assume everyone playing this knows what to do but I sure don't
Nothing stopping a player in a different timezone taking you out while you sleep

This game will either consume your life (you will always win in this case) or you will attempt to play it a healthy amount, and then lose to someone who is online when you are not. Such is the nature of real-time-strategy. Not for me, and I recommend saving your sanity.
absolute dogshit 0/10 never play this game
